ygData.subject: A Note about the List
ygData.msgSnippet: Just to throw something in... I don t know if it s the best way, but I always seem to learn from my mistakes.  In any case, I have been posting to Povar only
ygData.messageBody:
Just to throw something in... I don't know if it's the best way, but I always seem to learn from my mistakes. In any case, I have been posting to Povar only to find out I haven't. =) I was wondering why I wasn't getting my own letters sent back to me, or why nobody would reply to my questions. Heh anyway, here's a tip for the list:

Make sure your address recorded in your email is the address the list is being sent to.

Or at least, the email address you gave to Onelist. All this time I had my email addy as a different address (one I give to people I don't trust. =) ). So if you are posting, and your questioning whether it's going through or not, it's not! Well, that is, if you don't get your own responses back.

Anyway, this has been a moment of stupidity brought to you by yours truly. =)

Tiresias
Servant of Erollisi Marr
